refactor(babe): reorganize packages and files
commitResults.messageBody: Refactored files and packages under the babe package.

commitResults.messageTitle: Modified(build.gradle) to match rest of the project
Merge branch 'add-gradle-support'
test: add JUnit tests for Parser and Storage classes
commitResults.messageBody:
Add JUnit tests to verify core functionality:
- Test Parser.createDeadline() for valid/invalid inputs
- Test Storage.save() and Storage.load() for multiple scenarios

commitResults.messageTitle: build: package app as executable JAR
Add JavaDoc comments to classes and methods
commitResults.messageBody:
- Added header and method-level JavaDoc comments for better documentation
- Covered most non-private classes and methods with detailed explanations
- Documented non-trivial private methods for clarity

commitResults.messageTitle: Add task search functionality by keyword
commitResults.messageBody:
- Add findTasks method to TaskList to search task descriptions
- Implement FindCommand to handle 'find' user input
- Support case-insensitive keyword matching in task descriptions
- Display matching tasks in consistent UI format
- Add input validation and error handling for empty keywords

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-A-Level9': Add find command feature
commitResults.messageBody:
Add task search functionality allowing users to find tasks by keywords
- Search tasks by description (case-insensitive)
- Format search results in consistent UI style
- Support error handling for invalid inputs

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaFX GUI interface
commitResults.messageBody:
- Create Launcher class to handle JavaFX initialization
- Implement main chat window with message display area
- Add input field for user commands
- Maintain CLI-style interaction with bye command functionality
- Convert chat display from text-based to graphical interface
- Update documentation for GUI usage

This commit transitions the application from a pure CLI to a
GUI while maintaining the command-line interaction style.
The JavaFX implementation provides a more modern interface
while preserving core chatbot functionality.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Add assertions to DateTimeParser for input validation and error handling
commitResults.messageBody:
- Added assertions to ensure input date-time strings are not null or empty.
- Added assertions to validate parsed LocalDateTime objects are not null.
- Added assertions to ensure formatted date-time strings are not empty.
- Improved robustness by documenting assumptions and catching potential issues early.

These changes enhance the reliability of the DateTimeParser class by enforcing
critical assumptions during parsing and formatting operations. Assertions are
used to validate inputs and outputs, ensuring the class behaves as expected
during normal execution.

commitResults.messageTitle: refactor: Improve code quality and readability of Storage class
commitResults.messageBody:
- Extracted logic for validating and creating tasks into separate methods to reduce nesting and improve readability.
- Added validation methods (`validateTaskParts`, `validateDeadlineParts`, `validateEventParts`) to handle errors explicitly.
- Renamed variables and methods for clarity and consistency.
- Applied SLAP (Single Level of Abstraction Principle) to ensure each method focuses on a single level of abstraction.
- Improved error handling and validation to make the code more robust.
- Simplified the `formatTask` method for better readability.
- Added comments to explain the purpose of each method.

These changes enhance the maintainability, readability, and reliability of the Storage class while adhering to coding best practices.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge pull request #1 from avinazz3/branch-A-CodeQuality
commitResults.messageBody: Refactor: Improve code quality and readability

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Add assertions to TaskList class for runtime verification
commitResults.messageBody:
- Add defensive programming checks throughout TaskList to catch bugs early
- Verify critical invariants like null checks and list size changes
- Ensure consistent state after task modifications
- Validate method preconditions and postconditions

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Add javadoc comments to TaskList
Merge pull request #2 from avinazz3/branch-A-Assertions
commitResults.messageBody: Add runtime verification to TaskList implementation through assertions

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Add priority levels to tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Implement task prioritization system with three levels (High, Medium, Low):
- Add Priority enum to Task class with levels 1-3
- Update Parser to handle priority input via '/p' flag
- Add SetPriorityCommand for modifying existing task priorities
- Modify Storage to persist priority data
- Update Todo, Deadline, and Event classes with priority support

Example usage:
- Create task with priority: todo Read book /p 1
- Update priority: priority 1 2
- Priority appears in display: [X][P1] Read book

Breaking changes:
- Storage format updated to include priority field
- Existing task constructors require priority parameter
- Task string representation now includes priority level

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge pull request #3 from avinazz3/branch-C-Priority
commitResults.messageBody: feat: Add priority levels to tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: Improve GUI appearance and fix JavaFX loading issues
commitResults.messageBody:
- Fix architecture compatibility issues by updating JavaFX dependencies for Apple Silicon (arm64)
- Resolve FXML loading errors in MainWindow and DialogBox
- Fix duplicate children issue in DialogBox component
- Improve message styling with proper alignment and colors
- Reduce avatar size to optimize space usage
- Add proper padding and spacing for better visual layout
- Update build configuration for Apple Silicon support

Technical improvements:
- Remove fx:root from MainWindow.fxml and use proper controller pattern
- Clear children before adding new ones in DialogBox to prevent duplicates
- Add proper anchoring of components in MainWindow
- Update JavaFX version to match JDK version

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge pull request #4 from avinazz3/branch-A-BetterGui
commitResults.messageBody: Improve GUI appearance and fix JavaFX loading issues

commitResults.messageTitle: fix: Remove redundant exception handling in priority parser
commitResults.messageBody: NumberFormatException is a subclass of IllegalArgumentException, so catching both was redundant. Now only catching the parent exception to handle both cases.

- Include additional features overview
